mapper.select:
SELECT t1.dbid_, t1.class_, t1.dbversion_, t1.hproci_, t1.type_, t1.execution_, t1.activity_name_, t1.start_, t1.end_, t1.duration_, t1.transition_, t1.nextidx_, t1.htask_
FROM JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST t1 WHERE t1.hproci_=#{str}
select count(*) from tabs t where t.TABLE_NAME='JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_OLD'
mapper.insert:
insert into JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_OLD ( dbid_, class_, dbversion_, hproci_, type_, execution_, activity_name_, start_, end_, duration_, transition_, nextidx_, htask_
) ( select ha.dbid_, ha.class_, ha.dbversion_, ha.hproci_, ha.type_, ha.execution_, ha.activity_name_, ha.start_, ha.end_, ha.duration_, ha.transition_, ha.nextidx_, ha.htask_ from jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_TMP ( dbid_, class_, dbversion_, hproci_, type_, execution_, activity_name_, start_, end_, duration_, transition_, nextidx_, htask_
) ( select ha.dbid_, ha.class_, ha.dbversion_, ha.hproci_, ha.type_, ha.execution_, ha.activity_name_, ha.start_, ha.end_, ha.duration_, ha.transition_, ha.nextidx_, ha.htask_ from jbpm4_hist_actinst ha, JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.dbid_=ha.hproci_ and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )
mapper.update: create table JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_OLD as select * from JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST a where a.dbid_=0
create table JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_TMP as select * from JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST a where a.dbid_=0
mapper.delete: delete from jbpm4_hist_actinst t where exists (select temp.dbid_ from JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST_TMP temp where t.dbid_=temp.dbid_)
delete FROM JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST t1 WHERE t1.hproci_=#{str}
delete FROM JBPM4_HIST_ACTINST t1 WHERE t1.dbid_=#{id}
